channel.title: Csps on MASE To Dos
channel.description: Recent content in Csps on MASE To Dos

item.title: Wednesday, December 4, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Refer to your Survival Guide for Day 1 tasks Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, December 2, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Read the submission requirements for the AP Explore Performance Task Discuss: What do you need to submit? Examine the provided samples Discuss: What’s the #1 piece of advice you have for someone taking on this task? What’s a “gotcha” people should look out for? What’s one question you still have about the task? Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 21, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Review the new vocab Review the Activity Guide and One-Pager Watch the video about cybercrime Choose your topic to research Begin researching Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 20, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Go over new vocab as a class Do the first cipher as a class Complete the rest of the bubbles individually or with a partner Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, November 19, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Choose one of the apps you discussed in yesterday’s Do Now to complete your Activity Guide about Research that app’s privacy policy Complete your Activity Guide Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, November 18, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Watch The Future Of Big Data (Also linked in Code.org) Read the article attached to the Google Classroom assignment: “It’s Modern Trade: Web Users Get as Much as They Give” Participate in class discussion Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Friday, November 15, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Check out the visualization of the world’s biggest data breaches Fill out your Activity Guide Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 11, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Complete your research about your chosen innovation Find a visual artifact that describes your innovation Make sure you have references included in your Project Guide Turn in your Project Guide and One-Pager Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 12, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Look over the activity guide and one-pager as a class Select an innovation; don’t spend a ton of time on this step. Start finding resources about your innovation Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, November 7, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Use the Google Trends website to investigate an idea that is interesting to you Do the Activity Guide to tell a story with the data you find Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, November 6, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Use the Google Trends website to investigate an idea that is interesting to you Do the Activity Guide to tell a story with the data you find Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, November 5, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Review Moore’s Law Complete the Big Data Sleuth Card Review pages 4-6 of the AP Test PDF Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, November 4, 2019
item.description: Complete and turn in Do Now Watch TED Talk video Start on Activity Guide Complete and turn in Exit Ticket
